description:
At our main law office location in Sacramento, California, clients can find the support and knowledgeable counsel they need when navigating some of life's most complex legal concerns. The attorneys at York Law Corporation take pride in providing exceptional representation to injury victims and those who experienced illegal or unfair treatment. As a law firm that focuses on personal injury, elder abuse and complex litigation, we can assist you and your loved ones in your pursuit of justice and financial recovery.

We are dedicated to serving our clients and our community well. Whether it's pursuing settlements in negotiations or fighting for a fair outcome in the courtroom, our law firm is committed to the compensation you deserve in cases pertaining to the following legal concerns:

  • Nursing home neglect
  • Elder Neglect
  • Wrongful Death

When you turn to York Law Corporation, you will receive aggressive representation along with compassionate support. Our decades of combined experience, extensive knowledge of the law and access to various resources allow us to effectively pursue positive results in every case we take. Our two attorneys employ a collaborative approach, working together to develop a legal strategy that is uniquely tailored and effective for your individual situation.

If you were injured due to another party's negligent actions, or if you believe you were the victim of harassment, discrimination or a violation of labor laws, we can help. Contact our California law office to schedule a free initial consultation to speak with an attorney about your case.
